name: Mimic Masher Maze
description:
Hey you. Have you ever opened a chest in a video game, expecting some sweet loot, but it turned out to be a monster in disguise? Well, now you can get some revenge in a randomly generated maze with big ol' hammer! Just make sure you find the mimic before he escapes.

This game was made as a joint entry for the PROCJAM 2020 and the 7dfps 2020.
